SubModule_Description: To use the Light Matrix module add the following import statement to your project:

Function.Function_Description: Change all the lights at the same time.

Parameters.Argument_Description: A list containing light intensity values for all 25 pixels.

Python_Code.Python_Code:
from hub import light_matrix
# Update all pixels on Light Matrix using the show function 

# Create a list with 25 identical intensity values 
pixels = [100] * 25 

# Update all pixels to show same intensity 
light_matrix.show(pixels)
Python_Code.Python_Description: Change all the lights at the same time.
